title: Himi 168
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Na’a ke hā’ele hifo
‘E ‘Eiki, mei ‘olunga
Ke mau ma’u ai ‘a e afi,
Fakahēvani totonu.
2.
‘Eiki, tafu ‘a e afi
‘O e ‘ofa mo’onia
Ki hoku loto kovi ni,
Ko hoku feilaulau’anga.
3.
Tuku ke ulo ma’u ai pē,
Ko ho fakaongo lelei,
Pea toe foki hake,
Ki he ‘Afiona, ‘Eiki.
4.
‘I he loto angavaivai
Mo e fa’a fakafeta’i,
Pea mo e angalelei,
Mo e loto fa’a kātaki.
5.
Pea u fa’a vakai foki,
Ki he afi ni totonu,
Pea u fa’a langa hake,
Ho’o ngāue ‘iate au.
6.
Pea u ngāue, pea lea,
Pea u fa’a mahalo ma’au,
Pea u tali teuteu ma’u pē,
‘Eiki, ki ho finangalo.
7.
Pea u fa’a fakafo’ou,
‘Eku tui mo e ‘ofa,
Hangē ko ho finangalo,
Kuo tuku kiate au.
8.
Ke fakakātoa’aki
‘A ho ngaahi anga’ofa,
‘Eku mate loto tui,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona. *
